system.effect:
Target: Your Pokémon with 6 Momentum
Effect: Your Pokémon loses 6 Momentum, and then gains +1 Momentum. Your Pokémon may immediately make an attack as an Interrupt, but this attack must target only a Tagged Foe. If the attack misses, it still deals damage as if it had the Smite keyword. If the attack hits, it’s automatically a Critical Hit. If it would have already been a Critical Hit, your Pokémon gains 3 Ticks of Hit Points. May be used only once per Scene per Pokémon.
system.name: Seize The Moment [CR]
